org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant.impl

Interface PlantScheduler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPlantScheduler

    public interface PlantScheduler
    A scheduler for Plant, created by PlantConfiguration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel(java.lang.Object task)
      Cancels a task, that was scheduled with either schedule(java.lang.Runnable, long) or scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable, long).
      void close()
      Shut down the plantScheduler thread pool.
      double currentTimeMillis()
      Returns the *approximate* time.
      java.lang.Object schedule(java.lang.Runnable _runnable, int _millisecondDelay)
      Schedule a Runnable to be run at a later time.
      java.lang.Object scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable _runnable, int _millisecondDelay)
      Schedule a Runnable to be run repeatedly.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        java.lang.Object schedule(java.lang.Runnable _runnable,
                        int _millisecondDelay)
        Schedule a Runnable to be run at a later time. The return value is an opaque task object, that can be cancelled.
        Parameters:
        _runnable - The Runnable to be scheduled.
        _millisecondDelay - How long to wait before the Runnable is to be run.

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        java.lang.Object scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable _runnable,
                                   int _millisecondDelay)
        Schedule a Runnable to be run repeatedly. The return value is an opaque task object, that can be cancelled.
        Parameters:
        _runnable - The Runnable to be run.
        _millisecondDelay - The delay between each run.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the _runnable is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the value of _millisecondDelay is invalid.

      • cancel

        void cancel(java.lang.Object task)
        Cancels a task, that was scheduled with either schedule(java.lang.Runnable, long) or scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable, long).
        Parameters:
        task - The scheduled task.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the task is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the task was not created by either schedule(java.lang.Runnable, long) or scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable, long).

      • currentTimeMillis

        double currentTimeMillis()
        Returns the *approximate* time.
        Returns:
        The *approximate* time.

      • close

        void close()
        Shut down the plantScheduler thread pool.
